short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily run a Twitch bot that sends a message to your channel when you receive a donation on Saweria.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily run a Twitch bot that sends a message automatically to your Twitch channel when you receive a donation on Saweria.

Easy to setup, configurable message template, and everything runs locally!


GitHub: https://github.com/SuspiciousLookingOwl/saweria-twitch-chrome

This is an unofficial extension made by community, and not affiliated with Saweria or Twitch in any way.
